subject: Re: Junit test: Neither failed or Passed
msgSnippet: Hi, Thanks for reply. But I wrote very simple test cases. One of test case just checks the title of Frame and second test checks the value of a combobox. The
messageBody:
Hi,
Thanks for reply.

But I wrote very simple test cases. One of test case just checks
the title of Frame and second test checks the value of a combobox.

The problem is not with Abbot framework, because I have tested a
sample application with Abbot with the same testcases. But as I run
the test cases with My Original application, junit gets exited without
printing any information about the problem.

May the problem be with my application, but should junit not report
the problem why it got interrupted. Because it is not telling the
reason of the problem, how can I debug the problem ?


Thanks


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Carfield Yim" <carfield@...> wrote:
>
> Will that indicate a possible deadlock??
>
> On 10/29/07, jls_nayak1983 <jls_nayak1983@...> wrote:
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> >
> > Hi,
> >
> > I am working on Junit testing for swing application. I am using
> > Abbot framework for gui testing. I have written a test class with
some
> > test cases. I created suite of tests by overriding the suite method.
> >
> > As I start the testing, the first test case is run and after that
> > the testing gets suddently stopped. It neither reports for failure or
> > successful of testing.
> >
> > How can I resolve the problem ?
> >
> > Thanks
> >
> >
>
